title: Cannot create account for Riot Games Support.
body:
Clicking "Sign In" gets this:

[http://i.imgur.com/AnAD0Fj.png](http://i.imgur.com/AnAD0Fj.png)

I need to submit a support ticket to **hopefully** fix my Lunar Revel Shop issue. To do that I'm required to sign in, which I can't.

Please send help. Thank you. I'm getting tired of creating threads to ask for help. I even had to post in the announcement board.

EDIT: POSSIBLE SOLUTION (FOUND IT MYSELF BECAUSE RIOT IS TOO BUSY TO DEAL WITH THEIR ONE CUSTOMER).

Can you sign in to Riot Support Page? Why I ask this is because the issue with the shop is connected with this, at least that's the case for me.

If you can, that means your problem is not the same with mine (or rather the cause of the issue).

If you can't access the sign in page or bump into "ERR_CONNECTION_REFUSED", you can look up on that errors and try the popular solutions. Also that means you are probably having the same issue as mine.

The fix I've found (after trying many popular solutions) is to disable your TCP/IPv6. That fixed it for me. I can sign in the support site and the Lunar Revel Shop button appeared for me.

replies.body:
Please try resetting your Internet Explorer settings. This will hopefully resolve your issues with both accessing the Riot Games Support website as well as the Lunar Revel shop. 

http://windows.microsoft.com/en-us/internet-explorer/reset-ie-settings
Thanks but it doesn't help with both issues. Tried and it's still the same.
